resources.string: Welcome to CookHelper, your best friend for managing your favorite recipes. CookHelper allows you to create, edit and store recipes and all their important details.
From the navigation drawer, you can access your Recipe Book. It is where you\'ll be able to add, edit, delete and view your recipes. Your collection of recipes will be displayed as a list.
How Do I Add A Recipe?

In Recipe Book, click the floating action button with the + sign. Next, you\'ll be able to enter the recipe name, the ingredients, a meal type, a cultural category, a maximum preparation time and a set of instructions.
How Do I View A Recipe?
In Recipe Book, click on the recipe from the list of recipes.
How Do I Edit A Recipe?
In Recipe Book, select the recipe and then click the Edit button.
How Do I Delete A Recipe?
In Recipe Book, press down on the selected recipe in which a dialog will appear requesting confirmation to delete.
How Do I Search For A Recipe?

From the navigation drawer, you can access Advanced Search.

The following search fields are: recipe name, ingredients, meal type, cultural category and maximum preparation time. Specify at least one or all of these fields and click Search.

Any results that match the query will display a list of recipes, otherwise it will indicate that no recipes have been found.
